input.sentences: there was a rocket making camp and the kids | both young and older loved it .
they got to `` blast off '' these rockets into the sky .
they came back down with parachutes .
such a great turnout for this first time event .
check out this remote controlled rocket blasting off .
output.sentences: Today was my sons 1st science project.
They were shooting rockets at the show to demonstrate flight trajectory and thoery.
My sons rocket flew the highest as I added a little extra powder to his rocket motor.
This picture was taken during the announcement of the winner.
Then after they continued to fire rockets.
